item.title: CVE-2024-2111|2024-03-28T02:04:07.161Z -- netweblogic -- events%20manager%20%E2%80%93%20calendar%2C%20bookings%2C%20tickets%2C%20and%20more%21
item.description: The Events Manager â€“ Calendar, Bookings, Tickets, and more! plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the physical location value in all versions up to, and including, 6.4.7.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
